source.e4731a80: Try to find the areas where we have to be very careful in Los Angeles, Phoenix and Huston.
source.6b0b7a55: 2) Geographic Approach 〜 Try to find the areas where we have to be very careful in Los Angeles, Phoenix and Huston.
source.9cf758b7: strong correlation  1)income and bucket  2)college and income  3)race and income 4)college and share of race
source.7b0f0357:
1. The objective of this nootbook

We have a lot of tragedies which everyone do not want, of course both sides. But sometimes, it may happen in the some certain environment. So I tried to find what kind of situation may cause tragedies. If I can find them in advance, I may prevent or reduce tragedies. Data science may help it !

2.　Approach

1) Preprocessing and Visualization

2) Geographic Approach

If I can find the areas where we have a lot of tragedies, I may be able to have some mesurements to prevent it in advance. For example, when I go there, I also have to be very carefull or try to choose any other route.

3) Correlation Approach

If I can find some correlations between features, I may be able to find some causal relationship and causes of tragedies.

4) Clustering

And I tired to find the segmentations in which I can find same patterns so that I can consider effective measurements.

3. Insight

1) In the cities where there are a lot of tragedies, I found some difference. For example, in Los Angeles, the tragedies are happening in both urban districts and suburbs. On the other hand, in Phoenix, the tragedies are happening in urban districts, and in Huston, the tragedies are happening in suburbs.

As quick-fix solution, Geographic Approach in which I can find where I may have the risk of tragedies may be important.

2) I found some correlations between features. For example, positive correlation between 'college' and 'income', and negative correlation between 'college' and 'poverty'. It means that I can have one hypothesis that "'Education' may be one of critical factor to prevent poverty and it also help us to prevent or reduce the tragedies."

According to the data( https://www.census.gov/library/publications/2016/demo/p60-256.html ), the median household income in the US in 2015 is $56,516.   Most people who were killed were below the median household income.

If the education gap cause increase the risk of the tragedies, we may be able to reduce it by improving the education system and overcoming the education gap.

EduTech, Digitalization and data science may help us to overcome the education gap and reduce the tragedies, and I hope it !
